about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: If you plan to pass another vehicle, you should:

about.name: If you plan to pass another vehicle, you should:

hasPart.assesses: If you plan to pass another vehicle, you should: | If you plan to pass another vehicle, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Even when you signal, you should not assume that the space you want to occupy is free or that other drivers will give you the right-of-way.

suggestedAnswer.text: Not assume the other driver will make space for you to return to your lane.

comment.text: Not assume the other driver will make space for you to return to your lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: Assume the other driver will let you pass if you use your turn signal.

comment.text: Assume the other driver will let you pass if you use your turn signal.

suggestedAnswer.text: Assume the other driver will maintain a constant speed.

comment.text: Assume the other driver will maintain a constant speed.

acceptedAnswer.text: Not assume the other driver will make space for you to return to your lane.

comment.text: Not assume the other driver will make space for you to return to your lane.

answerExplanation.text: Even when you signal, you should not assume that the space you want to occupy is free or that other drivers will give you the right-of-way.

comment.text: If you plan to pass another vehicle, you should: | Even when you signal, you should not assume that the space you want to occupy is free or that other drivers will give you the right-of-way.

hasPart.name: What usually causes a locked wheel skid?

about.name: What usually causes a locked wheel skid?

hasPart.assesses: What usually causes a locked wheel skid? | What usually causes a locked wheel skid? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A locked wheel skid is most commonly caused by a driver braking too hard while traveling at a high speed. Drivers should use their brakes smoothly and gradually.

suggestedAnswer.text: Braking too hard at a slow speed

comment.text: Braking too hard at a slow speed

suggestedAnswer.text: Braking lightly at a slow speed

comment.text: Braking lightly at a slow speed

suggestedAnswer.text: Braking too hard at a fast speed

comment.text: Braking too hard at a fast speed

acceptedAnswer.text: Braking too hard at a fast speed

comment.text: Braking too hard at a fast speed

answerExplanation.text: A locked wheel skid is most commonly caused by a driver braking too hard while traveling at a high speed. Drivers should use their brakes smoothly and gradually.

comment.text: What usually causes a locked wheel skid? | A locked wheel skid is most commonly caused by a driver braking too hard while traveling at a high speed. Drivers should use their brakes smoothly and gradually.

hasPart.name: A broken yellow centerline indicates that:

about.name: A broken yellow centerline indicates that:

hasPart.assesses: A broken yellow centerline indicates that: | A broken yellow centerline indicates that: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A broken yellow centerline next to your side of the road indicates that traffic may cross the centerline to pass from your side of the road.

comment.text: Passing is not permitted.

suggestedAnswer.text: Passing on the right is permitted when the way ahead is clear.

comment.text: Passing on the right is permitted when the way ahead is clear.

suggestedAnswer.text: Passing on the left is permitted when the way ahead is clear.

comment.text: Passing on the left is permitted when the way ahead is clear.

acceptedAnswer.text: Passing on the left is permitted when the way ahead is clear.

comment.text: Passing on the left is permitted when the way ahead is clear.

answerExplanation.text: A broken yellow centerline next to your side of the road indicates that traffic may cross the centerline to pass from your side of the road.

comment.text: A broken yellow centerline indicates that: | A broken yellow centerline next to your side of the road indicates that traffic may cross the centerline to pass from your side of the road.

hasPart.text: This sign warns that two lanes of traffic going the same direction will soon merge into one lane.

comment.text: Merge.
Winding road ahead.

suggestedAnswer.text: Reserved parking for persons with disabilities.

comment.text: Reserved parking for persons with disabilities.
Merge.

answerExplanation.text: This sign warns that two lanes of traffic going the same direction will soon merge into one lane.

hasPart.name: When you are facing a green light and there are pedestrians in the intersection:

about.name: When you are facing a green light and there are pedestrians in the intersection:

hasPart.assesses: When you are facing a green light and there are pedestrians in the intersection: | When you are facing a green light and there are pedestrians in the intersection: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When facing a green light, you must yield to pedestrians and vehicles already in the intersection. Drivers must yield to pedestrians when turning on a steady green signal.

suggestedAnswer.text: You must yield the right-of-way to pedestrians.

comment.text: You must yield the right-of-way to pedestrians.

suggestedAnswer.text: You have the right-of-way over pedestrians.

comment.text: You have the right-of-way over pedestrians.

suggestedAnswer.text: Pedestrians must wait for you to cross.

comment.text: Pedestrians must wait for you to cross.

acceptedAnswer.text: You must yield the right-of-way to pedestrians.

comment.text: You must yield the right-of-way to pedestrians.

answerExplanation.text: When facing a green light, you must yield to pedestrians and vehicles already in the intersection. Drivers must yield to pedestrians when turning on a steady green signal.

comment.text: When you are facing a green light and there are pedestrians in the intersection: | When facing a green light, you must yield to pedestrians and vehicles already in the intersection. Drivers must yield to pedestrians when turning on a steady green signal.

hasPart.name: If you become drowsy while driving, you should:

about.name: If you become drowsy while driving, you should:

hasPart.assesses: If you become drowsy while driving, you should: | If you become drowsy while driving, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If you start to feel tired while driving, drive to the first available rest stop or service area to take a break, nap, stretch, or change drivers. You should not rely on caffeine pills or energy drinks, as these are not a replacement for rest and may make your driving even more dangerous.

comment.text: Try to fight it.
Take a break.
Take some caffeine pills.
Take a break.

answerExplanation.text: If you start to feel tired while driving, drive to the first available rest stop or service area to take a break, nap, stretch, or change drivers. You should not rely on caffeine pills or energy drinks, as these are not a replacement for rest and may make your driving even more dangerous.

comment.text: If you become drowsy while driving, you should: | If you start to feel tired while driving, drive to the first available rest stop or service area to take a break, nap, stretch, or change drivers. You should not rely on caffeine pills or energy drinks, as these are not a replacement for rest and may make your driving even more dangerous.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: If you become drowsy while driving, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
